TitlePage.Title: &SmallNearRing;
TitlePage.Author: Joao Araújo jjrsga@gmail.com https://novamath.fct.unl.pt/research-groups/algebra-and-logic/

TitlePage.Abstract:
The &SmallNearRing; package is a &GAP; package containing methods and data to provide the complete list of non-isomorphic models for:
NearRing of orders 2 to 8.
